name: Fog Forest
description:
a PS1 Style Horror Game

Suddenly you into a vivid dream of a small forest with thick fog and a endless void surrounding it.

Fog Forest is a horror adventure experience, traverse a foggy land, the player looking for whatever she can to help she on her journey back to a town in the middle of an apocalypse caused by an unknown origin.

the player has to traverse a very foggy suburban environment to get to their end goal, a tree of life, by using a compass, avoiding or fighting strange creatures scattered around the place. 

Orientation is key, if she walks too far off, she might have to pay with life.

You're walking in thick, blind fog - quite literally. Single player is a more independent and lonely experience, your character can find more abilities of book.
